focallength: Samsung 10x Zoom Lens f = 4.3 ~ 43mm (35mm film equivalent : 24~240 mm)
smartauto: 1/8 ~ 1/2,000 sec., Program : 1 ~ 1/2,000 sec., Night : 16 ~ 1/2,000 sec., Fireworks : 2 sec.
flashmodes: Auto, Auto & Red-eye reduction, Fill-in flash, Slow sync, Flash Off, Red-eye fix
focusingmodes: TTL Auto Focus (Center AF, Multi AF, Tracking AF, Face Detection AF), Video Continuous Auto Focus
digitalzoom: Still Image mode : 1.0X ~ 5.0X (Optical * Digital : 50x), Intelli-Zoom : 2.0X (Optical * intelli :20X)
fileformat: Still Image: JPEG (DCF), EXIF 2.21, GIF *Movie Clip: MP4 (Video: MPEG-4.AVC/H.264, Audio: AAC)
